llm_text:
Why: The model flagged the transaction primarily because payment_format_ach (value=1) contributed the largest positive SHAP (+2.90662), i.e., ACH payment format raised the risk score. amount_received (11226.2, SHAP +0.82796) and amount_paid (11226.2, SHAP +0.71171) further increased the score, indicating the transaction size contributed to the alert. dayofweek (value=5, SHAP +0.43207) also raised the score (day 5 per mapping), while from_bank (117453, SHAP âˆ’0.55407) partially reduced the score.

Conclusion: The alert is driven mainly by use of ACH (payment_format_ach=1) together with the ~11,226.2 payment amounts and occurrence on dayofweek=5. The sending bank (from_bank) modestly lowered the model score. If ACH payments and this amount range are treated as higher-risk by the model, that combination explains the flag.
